headings: Want to learn to predict the future of business?
What Can You Do With an Economics Degree?
Why Earn My Economics Degree at Angelo State?
paragraphs: Economists can wield that kind of power. If that sounds fascinating to you, then you should consider earning a degree in economics. In our program, you’ll learn economic forecasting and how to analyze financial data to advise businesses and government agencies on their economic decisions.

Our wide-ranging degree plan includes the study of monetary policy, trade policy, economic development, foreign trade, and the behavior of businesses and firms. You’ll also gain practical experience through job shadowing and paid internship opportunities, as well as have access to all the services in ourCenter for Student Success. It’s a one-stop resource to help you achieve your academic and professional goals.
Contact Information
The Norris-Vincent College of Business is accredited by AACSB International.

Our faculty bring real-world experience to the classroom and offer a global view of economics and business. You’ll have the chance to work with them on high-level research projects, and they will also help you network and make professional contacts in local businesses and agencies.
Economics Faculty and Staff
ASU Distinguished ScholarshipsOur premier scholarships are awarded based on your academic achievement, and you don’t even have to apply. You are automatically considered once you are admitted to ASU.
General ScholarshipsWe offer over 600 different types of scholarships. You can apply for both our general scholarships and degree-specific scholarships with one application.
Blue and Gold GuaranteeIf you have financial need, you may qualify forfree tuitionto attend Angelo State.

Start your career as soon as you graduate. The increasing complexity of the global economy and a more competitive business environment are driving a positive jobs outlook for economists and related professionals.
Earning your bachelor’s degree in economics will prepare you for career opportunities as an economist in any type of business, government agency or nonprofit organization.
Explore Career Possibilities

Our branch of the Texas Tech University Free Market Institute helps us develop our teaching and research in economics to make sure our curriculum stays on the cutting edge. It also brings in prominent economists from across the country for special presentations. You’ll get to network with some of the top economic minds in the U.S.

You can engage with professionals at local businesses, firms and nonprofit agencies through our internship and shadowing programs. You can also participate in our McLane Teammates Reading Program and delve into current economic topics. It could lead to a $1,000 scholarship! These types of experiences will give you an advantage when it comes to applying for jobs or for graduate school.

You can gain a global perspective of business and economics on our annual summer study abroad trip to Europe. You’ll visit cities in Austria, Czech Republic, England, France, Germany, Greece, Italy, Slovakia and Spain that host numerous multinational corporations and other international organizations. You’ll also get to visit various historical sites to truly broaden your horizons.

Take your education to the next level in theASU Honors Program. Through special courses, cultural events, research and community engagement, we’ll help you transform your intellectual and personal talents into marketable skills for your future. You’ll also have the opportunity to participate in prestigious internships, fellowships and other programs to reach your full potential.
Explore the Honors Advantage

OurFreshman Collegeis a one-stop resource for programs and services that help you transition into college life, improve your communication skills, and engage in active learning. You can also get academic help in theMath LabandWriting Center, receive peer mentoring and tutoring throughSupplemental Instruction, or set up onlinetutoringsessions.
If you want to go fast, go alone. But if you want to go far, go together.
ApplyVisit UsRequest Info

“I have no doubt, had I not gone through the Angelo State business school myself, that I would be anywhere near where I am today. It’s an honor to own a San Angelo-based business and give back to the university who helped me grow into an entrepreneur. Knowing I can directly influence the next generation of business-owners is an incredible feeling.”

Blake Vincent, Class of 1996

“The economics degree at Angelo State gives another opportunity to students who want to get a background and have a passion for economic development.”

Danny Chavez, Class of 2013
